get

public static Schema get(Connection conn,
                         java.lang.Integer id)
                  throws JnipapException
Get schema from NIPAP by ID Fetch the schema from NIPAP by specifying its ID. If no matching schema was found, an exception is thrown.

id - ID of requested schema
